name: 2021 Demo Day Finalist: Rem's Reality
description: "I spend a lot of my time drawing and animating on my drawing tablet, as well as creating new characters and stories. Telling stories through art, with either comics or games, has always been one of my favorite things to do. As well as art, I also love playing video games such as any Pokemon games I can get my hands on, Minecraft, Genshin Impact, and many more :D"
